title: need to find this if possible
content:
Can anyone identify this for me, assuming it is a font? The capital R’s are consistent.

JH

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122121839im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Unknown_4740.jpeg)

 [‹ Ragie Original fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122121839/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48566 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font on the sign at Checkpoint Charlie ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122121839/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48590 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jazzhustler

comments.content: That’s a mix of the upper- and lowercase characters of [Paul Lloyd’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122121839/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/index.htm) Lightfoot Wide Expanded.

Thanks Mike your a star!

JH
